name: lifebox.
description: lifebox is a storage service where you can save your photos, videos, music and files. You can reach these files by phone, tablet or PC at any point where you have access to the internet. Easily share these files once connected to the internet. This application was written using frameworks AngularJS. My responsibilities on the project included supporting and improving the application, adding new feature, backend interaction.

name: iKassa.
description: Modern software device to work in the full range of retail. I worked on creating a web application. The application is written on Angular 7 using Angular Material and flex-layout. REST. My responsibilities within the project included architecture, authorization, routing and navigation, creating components, working with API and Canvas.

name: Plugin.
description: The plugin is written on Angular 6 with Angular Material and flex-layout. REST. My project responsibilities included routing and navigation, creating components and working with API.

name: Hotel website.
description: This website is written using the Beckbone framework. My project responsibilities included supporting and improving this application and rewriting components to Angular 4 using Bootstrap 4 and working with the API. REST.
